commandobject.name: SetDialog
commandobject.documentation: Sets the dialog for specified player. Dialog will be set just if the player has our bot selected by cursor (ALT+SHIFT and the LeftMouse button). Note that not all of the Option variables have to be set. But they need to be set succesively starting from 0,1,2 etc. They are parsed in this order and first emty Option will terminate parsing.

property.name: Id
property.documentation: Id of the player we want to set dialog for.

property.name: DialogId
property.documentation: Our Id of the dialog - we will match this Id in response messages and in PLI messages. We choose this value.

property.name: Option0
property.documentation: One of the options (possible answers) for the dialog.
